climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Easy-to-use GPS navigator with 5.0” dual-orientation display
Preloaded with detailed maps of the lower 49 states
Easily search addresses and millions of points of interest
body.description: Product # 010-01198-01The Garmin Nuvi55LM GPS Navigator features a 5" dual orientation touchscreen display and comes preloaded with detailed maps of the lower 49 states. The unit stays unaffected by cellular dead zones as it does not rely on cellular signals. The GPS has a search field that makes finding addresses and millions of points of interest, easier and quicker. The Nuvi55LM makes it easy to look up addresses and navigation with voice-prompted, turn-by-turn directions that speak street names. The unit issues audible alert and displays onscreen warning when approaching a school zone.Nuvi 55LM Features:PHYSICAL:Screen Size: 5" TouchscreenDual-orientation DisplayDisplay Resolution: 480 x 272 pixelsDisplay Type: WQVGA color TFT w/ White BacklightBattery: Rechargeable Lithium-ion BatteryBattery Life: Up to 2 hours Per ChargeHigh-sensitivity receiverMAPS / MEMORY:Preloaded Street MapsIncludes Lifetime Map UpdatesMemory: Built-in Internal Solid State MemoryData Cards: Accepts microSD Cards (Not Included)Waypoints/Favorites/Locations: Stores up to 1000SPECIALIZED FEATURES:Voice PromptsSpeaks Street NamesLane AssistJunction ViewmyTrendAuto Sort Multiple DestinationsRoute AvoidanceUnaffected by Cellular Dead ZonesSchool Zone WarningsOne-Stop Device Management w/ Garmin ExpressSAFETY:Speed Limit IndicatorFind Closest Point of IntrestView Upcoming Points of Interest Along RouteCustom POIsCUSTOMIZABLE FEATURES:Garmin Garage VehiclesGarmin Garage VoicesTrip PlannerTrip LogWindows Compatibility: XP or LaterMAC Compatibility: OSX 10.4 or Later

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it looked and works completely like new. Had no issues putting it on my ...
reviews.reviewText: I just got my Garmin today and used it in a little test run and it worked perfectly! Couldn't even tell it has been refurbished; it looked and works completely like new. Had no issues putting it on my car; and it was very easy and user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice garmin device it's the second one i've ever owned
reviews.reviewText: nice garmin device it's the second one i've ever owned. this gives you the double screen; it gives you the basic one screen of where you're driving but when you're about the make an exit on a highway for example it splits into two screens to show you a pic of which exit or lane (in a multiple lane) you need to be in in order to not get lost. this device was quite helpful for my trip from illinois to tennessee. i only made a wrong turn once during the night returning back home because (bad timing as things go) the garmin told me to turn at this particular time at night during some construction going on in indiana when a big ol semi truck happened to block my view of which exit i needed to go off! but i did a quick five minute turnaround with no problem! very nice product as always from garmin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it a lot
reviews.reviewText: I like it a lot, does what I ask. Shows me off ramps, turning info, an speed of vichicle , plus speed limit. But it was stolen out of my truck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my Garmin! 5 stars! ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.reviewText: I love this GPS! I travel from Utah to California often and I'm a single women who travels alone with my children. I get great piece of mind in knowing I'll never be lost especially while in a big city like LA or San Diego. It finds nearby resteraunts, shopping, and much more! It's easy to use right out of the box! I HIGHLY recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The product does not seem like Nuvi 55LM
reviews.reviewText: I purchased Nuvi 55LM 5 few years ago and I have been happy with the product. The Nuvi 55LM has speech that includes street name, and the screen includes speed limit of the road. As I was happy with the product, I purchased another Nuvi 55LM for my brother. However, the speech does not include the street name, e.g., speech says "turn right in 0.5 miles", instead of "turn right in Lake View street in 0.5 miles".I need to look up the street name from the screen to check with the street sign, which is dangerous while driving. The screen also does not look like Nuvi 55LM. My Nuvi 55LM shows both the speed limit and my current speed. The speed limit is very useful. So I was not happy with the current product, and return it. I will try to purchase Nuvi 55LM 5 again through Amazon, hopefully this time I will get the right Nuvi 55 LM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Take your time and it will double check you helping you know your on the right track~!
reviews.reviewText: It's screen online picture shows it larger that one would think, as my big hands had a hard time entering info. But the good is it takes up less front window. Then you have to be careful of just turning when it says to. You will see it say "turn left" when you are in the middle of the intersection ! Overall I'll say it is worth the money for a basic point "A" to point "B".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot for work, and they won't pay for navigation rental. This one is awesome. It's big enough to see clearly, and the voice navigation is clear. I've even taken this to Hawaii on vacation. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price point.
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy my Garmin Nuvi 55lm. I personally was buying Garmin navigators since they were $999.99. While the other unit was more durable, I don't need a football to throw around. This one is light weight and an easy carry. I wish it had the Live ability to update traffic every 2 minutes but, for the price point I will use this in conjunction with my phone's gps capabilities. I like the side pictures available when exiting because it makes knowing where to go more exact.
